description: Spark transforms raw prompts into optimized signal structures using the 4-D Methodology. It classifies input into five prompt types and routes them through recursive logic layers. Spark is the reflection module in the AyEyeLabs framework.
prompt_templates: Classify this input and rewrite it into a 4-D optimized prompt suitable for the 'Technical' type.
Analyze this raw user message and reflect it through the Spark router for routing logic output.
